item.title: Cyber Safety Talks for Vulnerable Elderly People
item.description: I developed and delivered cyber safety talks for elderly individuals, teaching them how to recognize and avoid phone and online scams. I created a PowerPoint presentation, distributed safety reminder stickers, and held Q&A sessions after each talk to address concerns and offer further guidance.
